channel.title: LSE:ABDN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:ABDN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Brazil Bulls Hold Firm as Trump Drags Country Into His Trade War
item.description: Money managers from Aberdeen Group Plc to Franklin Templeton are staying bullish on Brazil, betting the country will withstand its unexpected turn in the epicenter of Donald Trump’s trade war.
